UT`s student body includes more than 850 international students from 65 countries (incl. around 550 international degree students). UT currently offers 70 Bachelors, 80 Masters and 35 doctoral degree programmes, including 11 full English-language curricula plus 7 joint programmes. The University of Tartu is Estonia`s leading centre of research and development. 60% of all doctoral dissertations in Estonia are defended at UT (2011 was a record year, with 152 PhDs awarded). More than half of all Estonian scientific publications are written by researchers at UT. In recent years, UT researchers have exceeded Essential Science Indicators 1% impact threshold in: Clinical Medicine, Chemistry, Environmental Science and Ecology, Plant and Animal Science, Geosciences, Social Sciences (general), Biology and Biochemistry, Materials Science, Life Sciences, Engineering, Molecular Biology and Genetics, Psychiatry and Psychology.
addr: University of Tartu, ulikooli 18, 50090, Eesti

name: American University
over:
Founded in 1893 and located at the top of Embassy Row in the nation`s capital, American University (AU) in Washington, D.C., is home to a prestigious faculty, guest speakers, and visiting world leaders who are influential practitioners and thought leaders. Students learn from award-winning scholars and researchers, policy makers, authors, artists, filmmakers, lawyers, scientists, and journalists. Balancing theory and practice, they take full advantage of the capital city, a remarkable laboratory for learning. Faculty and students are deeply connected through research partnerships and networking with top organizations in government, business, and the nonprofit worlds. AUs smart, passionate, focused, and engaged students and faculty focus their knowledge to create meaningful change. With historic academic strengths in international service and public affairs, AU has an unmatched sense of social responsibility and a commitment to cultural and intellectual diversity, and is defined by its global perspective, practical idealism, and dedication to public service.<\/p>

AU offers five nationally recognized schools for undergraduate and graduate study: the School of Public Affairs, the School of International Service, Kogod School of Business, the School of Communication, the College of Arts and Sciences. AU also offers 5 law degrees through its distinguished Washington College of Law, as well as specialized programming in the School of Professional and Extended Studies. <\/p>
addr: American University, 4400 Massachusetts Avenue Northwest, Washington, DC 20016, United States

name: Loughborough University
over: Loughborough University has an international reputation for excellence in teaching and for world-leading research and innovation. It is also the country`s premier university for sport, with an outstanding record of achievement in both performance and the underpinning academic disciplines of exercise and health sciences. In recognition of its contribution, the University has been awarded seven Queen's Anniversary Prizes most recently in 2013, for research and skills development in High Value Manufacturing to create economic growth. Loughborough`s research is driven by society`s need to address real-life issues. It contributes at the highest levels to new knowledge and understanding, helping business to compete more effectively, shaping public policy and improving people`s quality of life. Commercial potential is at the heart of Loughborough`s research. It has long standing collaborative links with many public and private sector organisations and a strong record of fostering innovation.
addr: Loughborough University, Loughborough, Leicestershire LE11 3TU, United Kingdom

name: University of Waterloo
over:
As one of Canada’s top innovation universities, the University of Waterloo is home to 100+ programs in business, health, engineering, math, science, the arts, environment, and more. 
Through the world's largest co-op (paid internship) program, you can include up to two years of relevant work experience as part of your degree, giving you an advantage in your future career. Our network of over 7,100 employers includes many of the world’s leading companies.  
Waterloo ranks among the world’s top 175 universities in the QS World University Rankings 2021 and top 250 in the Times Higher Education World University Rankings 2021. We’re also home to Physics and Astronomy professor Donna Strickland, winner of the 2018 Nobel Prize in Physics (only the third woman in history to do so). 
With over 50,000 university and college students in the surrounding community, there’s an exciting range of shops and restaurants. The University is located in the city of Waterloo, 110 km west of Toronto, Canada’s largest and most dynamic city. It’s also home to residents from 200 cultural backgrounds.
addr: University of Waterloo, 200 University Avenue West, Waterloo, ON N2L 3G1, Canada

name: Colorado State University
over: Colorado State University is one of our nation's leading research universities with world-class research in infectious disease, atmospheric science, clean energy technologies, and environmental science. It was founded in 1870 as the Colorado Agricultural College, six years before the Colorado Territory became a state. Last year, CSU awarded degrees to more than 6,000 graduates, and this year, it attracted more than $300 million in research funding. Colorado State is a land-grant institution and a Carnegie Doctoral\/Research University-Extensive institution. Colorado State University is the university of choice for Colorado residents  around 30% of all of Colorado's science, math, engineering and technology majors pursue degrees at CSU. In addition to its excellent programs in those areas, CSU offers among the very best professional programs in the United States in veterinary medicine, occupational therapy, journalism, agriculture and construction management.
addr: Colorado State University, Fort Collins, CO 80523, United

name: University of Canterbury
over: The University of Canterbury is located in Christchurch, the largest city in New Zealand's South Island. The university offers: world-class research; inspirational teaching; a vibrant campus environment; and a great student lifestyle with students from around the world.
addr: University of Canterbury, 20 Kirkwood Ave, Upper Riccarton, Christchurch 8041, New Zealand

name: University of Guelph
over: The University of Guelph is recognized worldwide as a research-intensive and learner-centred institution. Established in 1964, the University includes seven colleges: the College of Arts, College of Biological Science, College of Management and Economics, College of Physical and Engineering Science, College of Social and Applied Human Sciences, Ontario Agricultural College and Ontario Veterinary College. The University of Guelph offers a broad range of world-class programs at both the undergraduate and graduate levels. Programs cover the full range of disciplines in the arts and humanities, social sciences, commerce and management, natural and physical sciences, engineering, agriculture, and veterinary science. With an average of more than $150 million in annual research funding, the University of Guelph is one of Canada`s top research institutions.. It is Canada`s innovative leader in plant and animal life sciences and a premier centre for agri-food, biotechnology and environmental research, education and outreach. Guelph is home to 1000 international students from 100 countries and offers 70 study abroad programs with 33 countries. The University has public- and private-sector partners in 30 countries, and participates in development projects in Africa, Asia and South America. Our graduates are global ambassadors, with more than 100,000 alumni in 145 countries
addr: The University of Guelph, 50 Stone Road East, Guelph, ON N1G 2W1, Canada

name: Universiti Teknologi Malaysia
over: Towards the entrepreneurial, innovative and global university Since it became a full-fledged university in 1972, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM) has played a pivotal role as Malaysias largest contributor of technical and professional workforce for the local industry, government agencies as well as multinational companies. Along with its vision to be recognised as a world-class Entrepreneurial Research University, UTM is set to be the centre of academic and technological excellence. Its mission is to be a leader in the development of human capital and innovative technologies that will contribute to the nations wealth creation. UTM is now regarded as Malaysias premier institution in engineering, science and technology. UTMs vision is in line with the nations aspiration of becoming a knowledge-based, innovation-led economy that is grounded in creativity and innovation with high value creation.
addr: Universiti Teknologi Malaysia UTM Johor Bahru, 81310 Johor Malaysia

name: Creighton University
over: There is no university in the country like Creighton University in terms of size, the array of renowned and challenging professional and graduate programs offered, and the strong commitment to Catholic and Jesuit ideals and values. Creighton offers a distinct advantage having nine schools and colleges on one walkable campus. The diversity of disciplines allows unique interprofessional opportunities in programming that combine faculty and resources from multiple fields. Graduates with this interdisciplinary view of the world bring sought-after skills sets to the workplace. Students enjoy personalized advising, a strong focus on leadership skills, abundant opportunities for internships and undergraduate research and life-changing community service experiences. Creighton understands that success isn't defined solely by what students do, but by whom they become and we prepare our students for life through hands-on collaborative learning experiences with distinguished faculty, top business executives and networking with engaged alumni. With more than 70 undergraduate majors and more than 30 graduate and professional programs, Creighton is the ideal learning environment - small personalized classes, accomplished faculty mentors, and a 96 percent placement rate in jobs or graduate and professional schools within eight months of graduation.
addr: Creighton University, 2500 California Plaza, Omaha, NE 68102, United States

name: University of Porto
over: With origins dating back to the eighteenth century, the University of Porto is currently one the most prestigious Higher Education Institutions of Europe. Close to 32,000 students, 2,400 (1825,0 FTE) teachers and researchers along with 1,600 administrative staff attend its 15 schools and 51 scientific research units, spread across 3 university campuses located in the city of Porto. With 14 faculties and a business school, the University of Porto provides an exceptional variety of courses, covering the whole range of study areas and all levels of higher education. In fact, offering over 600 training programmes per year (from degrees to continuous professional training), the University of Porto has teaching solutions for everyone.
addr: Reitoria da Universidade do Porto, Praca de Gomes Teixeira, 4099-002, Portugal

name: National Chiao Tung University
over: National Chiao Tung University, a top research university in Taiwan located adjacent to the Hsinchu Science Park (the Silicon Valley of Asia), emphasizes the integration of science and humanities by offering innovative trainings and interdisciplinary studies in a full spectrum of disciplines. Our elite study body, representing top 3% in their fields, came from more than 40 countries. Student enrolment currently stands at more than 10,000 in nine colleges, including Electrical and Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Biological Science and Technology, Management, Humanity and Social Science, Hakka Studies, and Photonics. National Chiao Tung University has been the cradle for the nation`s high-tech industry leaders as well as for innovation and research. The University`s alumni play influential roles on Taiwan`s electronics, computer and semiconductor sectors. Currently more than 65% of the chairpersons, CEOs and general managers at Hsinchu Science Park companies are NCTU`s alumni.
addr: National Chiao Tung University Kuang-Fu Campus, No. 1001,University Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan 300

name: Arizona State University
over: Arizona State University has created a new model for American higher education, an unprecedented combination of academic excellence, entrepreneurial energy and access. ASU is visionary, scaling its commitments to a world that needs big ideas and bold action. It has the strength in numbers to achieve meaningful change, with four distinctive campuses in Metropolitan Phoenix serving more than 73,000 students from all fifty states and more than one hundred nations across the globe. ASU transcends boundaries, with research inspired by real world application to address the challenges facing Arizona, the nation and the world.
addr: Arizona State University - Downtown Phoenix Campus, 411 North Central Avenue, Phoenix, AZ 85004, United States

name: Beijing Institute of Technology
over: Beijing Institute of Technology (BIT), originally named the Academy of Natural Sciences, is an open, public, research-oriented university with a focus on science and technology. It is the 10th university approved to enter the national ?985 Project? which aims to develop world class and renowned universities in China, and receives considerable trilateral supports and endowments under the agreement signed by Ministry of Education, the Commission of Science, Technology & Industry for National Defense, and Beijing Municipal Government in September 2000. BIT is now under the supervision of Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. BIT offers 60 undergraduate programs, 144 graduate programs, 61 doctoral programs and 19 postdoctoral programs. Over the past 30 years, BIT has received more than 120 national awards of scientific research, ranking among the top 10 universities in China. Till October 2010, BIT has established collaborative ties with around 140 universities from 43 countries and regions in the world. BIT receives about 400 international students for degrees and language every year, and they come from around 40 countries and regions.
addr: Beijing Institute of Technology, 5 Zhongguancun Nandajie Haidian District Beijing 100081 China

name: University of Navarra
over: The University of Navarra was founded in 1952 by St. Josemaria Escriva de Balaguer and is a Corporate Work of Opus Dei (a personal Prelature of the Catholic Church). There are 32 degree programs, 10 double degree programs, 2 bilingual programs, 35 masters programs, 50 university-accredited degrees, and 24 doctoral programs. The main campus is located in Pamplona where there are 13 schools. Also in Pamplona are the University Hospital, which takes care of over 160,000 patients a year, the Center for Applied Medical Research (CIMA), the Center for Research in Applied Pharmacology (CIFA) and the Institute of Culture and Society. The University of Navarra has another campus in San Sebastian as well as the 3 IESE Business School campuses: Barcelona, Madrid and New York. New projects of the University are the Center of Nutrigenomics, the Center of Bioengineering, the Center of Neglected Diseases and the Museum of Contemporary Art.
addr: Biblioteca de la Universidad de Navarra, Campus Universitario, Plantas 1-5, 31080 Pamplona, Navarra, Spain

name: University of Texas at Dallas
over: Founded in 1969, The University of Texas at Dallas has evolved into one of the top research institutions in Texas, and its programs in engineering and the biomedical sciences have gained national attention. With an enrollment of 21,193, UT Dallas offers students the close-knit community of a small university with excellent student-faculty ratios of 22:1. However, UT Dallas is also backed by the powerful UT System and is aligned strategically with other institutions to offer advanced research opportunities traditionally found at larger institutions. As a young, agile and rapidly growing university, The University of Texas at Dallas attracts a unique combination of student and faculty resources to the vibrant, dynamic and globally connected Dallas-Fort Worth area. UT Dallas is ranked in the top 100 by Kiplinger?s and in the top 75 by The Princeton Review as a best value among public universities, and Times Higher Education ranks UT Dallas as #1 in Texas and #15 in the world among the top 100 universities under 50 years of age.
addr: The University of Texas at Dallas, 800 West Campbell Road, Richardson, TX 75080, United States

name: University of Nebraska
over: The University of Nebraska Lincoln is a public institution, founded in 1869 as a land-grant facility. UNL is an educational institution of international stature, listed by the Carnegie Foundation within the 'Research Universities (very high research activity)' category. UNL is a land-grant university and a member of the Association of Public and Land-grant Universities (APLU). The university is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission of the North Central Association of Colleges and Schools. Programs are offered through the Colleges of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources, Architecture, Arts and Sciences, Business Administration, Education and Human Sciences, Engineering, Fine and Performing Arts, Journalism and Mass Communications, and Law; and the Exploratory and Pre-Professonal Advising Center. Its 624-acre campus is located in Lincoln, 55 miles southwest of Omaha.
addr: University of Nebraska-Lincoln, 1400 R St, Lincoln, NE 68588, United States

name: Southeast University
over: Southeast University is a public research university located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China. It was part of one of the oldest universities and the first coeducational university in China. It is a member of both Project 985 and Project 211, and sponsored by the Ministry of Education of China aiming to become a well-known world-class university. SEU has been ranked among the top 20 research universities in China, and among the top 300 in the world. In the official subject ranking conducted by the Ministry of Education of China, SEU has been ranked top three nationally in 8 fields including architecture, landscape architecture, urban planning, art history, civil engineering, electronic engineering, transportation engineering and biomedical engineering.
addr: 2 Sipailou, Nanjing, 210096 Jiangsu Province, China

name: University of Coimbra
over: The University of Coimbra is the oldest university in Portugal and one of the oldest in the world. Its history goes back to century that followed the establishment of Portugal itself, as it was founded in 1290 by the decree Scientiae thesaurus mirabilis, issued by King Dinis. Aware of its 722 years of historic responsability, the University of Coimbra is a model in permanent updating and adjustment to the country's history. It endeavours to honour its past through a search for excellence and attitude of social accountability. With the past founded on the construction of the future, the University of Coimbra is presently a model of quality not only in matters of education, groundbreaking research and links to business and industry, but also in its engagement in social action and cultural activities. The oldest Portuguese University is therefore also the best known and internationally acknowledged and one of the most important national institutions.
addr: University of Coimbra, Paco das Escolas Coimbra 3004-531, Portugal

name: University of Nebraska Medical Center
over: Nebraska`s only public academic health sciences center, UNMC is committed to the education of a 21st century health care work force, to finding cures and treatments for devastating diseases, to providing the best care for patients, and to serving our state and its communities through award-winning outreach. UNMC also is committed to embracing the richness of diversity, and is a major economic engine for the state of Nebraska.
addr: University of Nebraska Medical Center, 42nd and Emile, Omaha, NE 68198

name: Stellenbosch University
over: Stellenbosch University (SU) is a public university located in the metropolitan area of Cape Town, with all the advantages of the classic campus. It has four campus. The main campus is located in Stellenbosch, the historic town (est. 1679). Medical and business school campuses in the city of Bellville, and military school in Saldanha. Su research-intensive university with 36% of their students at postgraduate level and the largest research production (full-time equivalent staff member) and the third largest in terms of total research among universities in South Africa. As a public institution of higher education SU regulated in accordance with the Law on Higher Education (101, 1997) and the Statute of the University of Stellenbosch. In 2010, Stellenbosch University (SU) was 27,694 students (10,043 graduate students) and 2,567 employees (835 teaching and research staff members, 1,457 administrative and technical staff and service workers 275). The University has ten faculties: Arts and Social Sciences, science, economics and management sciences, medicine, engineering, agricultural sciences, law, theology, education and military science. The raison d`etre of the University of Stellenbosch - to establish and maintain, in commitment to the academic ideal of excellent research and scientific practice, an environment in which knowledge can be discovered, can be shared, and can be applied for the benefit of the community.
addr: Stellenbosch University, Stellenbosch 7600, South Africa

name: University of South Florida
over: The University of South Florida is a high-impact, global research university dedicated to student success. USF is classified by the Carnegie Foundation for the Advancement of Teaching in the top tier of research universities, a distinction attained by only 2.2 percent of all universities. It ranks 50th in the nation for federal expenditures in research and total expenditures in research among all U.S. universities, public or private, according to the National Science Foundation.
addr: University of South Florida, 4202 East Fowler Avenue, Tampa, FL 33620, United States
